column5: Just got back from Dog Lake near Wawa. Even though the fishing had "eased up" a little compared to the previous two weeks, it was still good. We got our share of walleyes (not too many pike) and the size was just about right. Lots of 15 inchers (only got a few in the slot) and brother got a monster. Also tied into some wall hanger speckled trout at a smaller lake nearby. Although "Brutus" got away from us -- twice! Wanna go back in the fall now to get him. Trout
